Room.Name: West Hildor Lane/Boran Street Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: This is the corner of Hildor Lane and Boran Street, in Phexton Village.
Room.LongDescription: You can see quite a few shops along Boran Street, which leads north from here. There is a wall along the south side of the lane which stands at least three meters high. A tower is at the southwest corner of the village.
